channel.title: Comments on: VIDEO: Sonic Youth “Sacred Trickster” on The Late Show with David Letterman 06.10.2009

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: i'm waiting a full week before i listen to the new one the whole way through, but what i've heard thus far online and on sirius is incredible. my personal stinker though herr greenwood was sonic nurse.
item.content:encoded: i’m waiting a full week before i listen to the new one the whole way through, but what i’ve heard thus far online and on sirius is incredible. my personal stinker though herr greenwood was sonic nurse.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: it's a struggle. though, my loyalty is waning for many. the cure, for example.
item.content:encoded: it’s a struggle. though, my loyalty is waning for many. the cure, for example.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: I've never been able to reconcile your almost limitless forgiveness and fierce (sentimental) loyalty with your acerbic prose and critical ear. Never fails to entertain.
item.content:encoded: I’ve never been able to reconcile your almost limitless forgiveness and fierce (sentimental) loyalty with your acerbic prose and critical ear. Never fails to entertain.
